content.text:
Here is my response formatted as requested:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Referring Unresolved Customer Grievances

1. Assess the grievance
- Determine if the issue is truly unresolved
- Identify which department is best suited to handle it

2. Document the grievance details
- Record customer information and complaint specifics
- Note any previous attempts to resolve the issue

3. Select appropriate department
- Choose based on nature of grievance (e.g. billing, technical support)
- Verify current referral procedures for that department

4. Prepare referral message
- Summarize key details of the grievance
- Explain why further investigation is needed

5. Submit formal referral
- Use designated system or form to refer the case
- Include all relevant documentation

6. Notify the customer
- Inform them their case is being escalated
- Provide expected timeframe and next steps

7. Follow up
- Check on status of referred grievances
- Update customer as needed

</OUTPUT_TEXT>
